ygData.subject: When to try something else?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just hit 102 skill in tinkering tonite and made some Powered Gloves (woohoo!).  The next major item I d like to make for myself is the Footwarming boots.
ygData.messageBody:
I just hit 102 skill in tinkering tonite and made some Powered Gloves
(woohoo!). The next major item I'd like to make for myself is the
Footwarming boots. Apparently the trivial for footwarming is around the 168
mark.

At what skill level will I have like a 25% chance of even accomplishing this
item? Obviously I'll continue making Powered Gloves until the trivial mark
at 122, and then trying aqualungs. Aqualungs's trivial is 148, which takes
me close to the ~168 trivial of Footwarming boots. However, I'd like to try
the boots earlier on if there's a chance for success. However, I don't know
the formula for a chance of success being "x" number of skill points away
from the trivial point of the item you're trying to tinker.

Soooooo.... I'm at 102 now. What skill level can I being trying to make
Footwarming boots with somewhere around a 25% chance of success?

Anyone have any idea? Thanks if you do. :)

- Tynkur of Lanys T'Vyl
